question: Which of the following options is correct with regard to HTML?
answerOptions: It is a partial programming language
It is used to structure documents
correctAnswers: It is used to structure documents

question: How can you make a list that lists the items with numbers?

question: Which of the following is NOT a Style?
The elements <DIV> and <SPAN> have the following characteristics
answerOptions: Element <DIV> inherits properties defined for <SPAN> in a stylesheet
Elements <SPAN> and <DIV> define content to be inline or block-level
and are used as alternatives for the element
correctAnswers: Elements <SPAN> and <DIV> define content to be inline or block-level
